topLocations.title: Arkadi
topLocations.info: The Arkadi Monastery is an Eastern Orthodox monastery, situated on a fertile plateau 23 km to the southeast of Rethymnon.

topLocations.title: Palm Forest
topLocations.info: Preveli Beach, Finikodasos is a beach located in the  municipality of Agios Vasilios in the Rethymno

topLocations.title: Fortezza Castle
topLocations.info: The Fortezza is the citadel of the city of Rethymno in Crete,Greece. It was built by the Venetians in the 16th century.

topLocations.title: Kourtaliotiko Gorge
topLocations.info: Kourtaliotiko, is on the southern side of the western part of the island of Rethymno. It is situated where the Kourtaliotiko River flows southwards between the mountains of Kouroupa and  Xiron.

topLocations.title: The Old Town
topLocations.info: The old town in Rethymno it is located in the heart of today's Rethymno and combines the oriental appearance of the Ottoman Empire with the Western architectural style of the Renaissance.

topLocations.title: Triopetra Beach
topLocations.info: Triopetrabeach owes its name to the three imposing rocks found in its waters. It is located 52 km south of Rethymno town and 13     km north of Akoumia village.
